document_data.caption: A map Halruaa showing the River Ghalagar.
document_data.name: River Ghalagar
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Ghalagar''' was a small waterway found in western [[Halruaa]].
document_data.Geography: The River Ghalagar originated in the [[Lhairghal Mountains]] on Halruaa's western border. It flowed southeast through the foothills of the mountains where it bisected the [[Akhlaur Swamp]] before ultimately reaching [[Lake Halruaa]]. The river had a length of approximately {{SI|200|miles|long=yes}}.
